<file path="source.go">
package user

import (
    "fmt"
)

type User struct
    ID string

func (u *User) UpdateEmail(newEmail string) error
    if newEmail == "":
    u.email = newEmail
    return nil

func NewUser(id string, email string) *User
    return &User{
    		ID:    id,
    		email: email,
    	}
</file>
